ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In the morning they called out to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: At daybreak they called to each other:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: At daybreak they called out to one another:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the morning they called out to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They then called out to each other at daybreak.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they called out (one to another as soon) as the morning broke.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they called out to each other in the morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: In the morning they called to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they cried out one unto another in the morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So they called out to each other at the break of dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they cried out Unto each other in the morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: At dawn they called out to one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As the morning broke, they called out, one to another,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they called out one to another as soon as the morning broke,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (Then) in the morning they called out to one another, saying:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In the morning, they called to one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they called one another at morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:21] They then called out to one another in the morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they cried out one unto another in the morning) at the break of dawn,
